description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Project Alpha is an immersive 2D space RPG. With fully upgradeable ships and weaponry you will be dominating the galaxy in no time, all while boarding and stealing from other ships, trading materials and blowing up asteroids.
description.short: Project Alpha is an immersive 2D space RPG. With fully upgradeable ships and weaponry you will be dominating the galaxy in no time, all while boarding and stealing from other ships, trading materials and blowing up asteroids.
